text:
@realDonaldTrump Now that the death toll is crossing 70K, our stable genius @realDonaldTrump no longer says 60K will die. He now says 100K. He said 0 in early March, then said it would go away when it gets warm. Trump is a dangerous and lying president.
https://t.co/COYaMqpuih
